Package org.gridforum.gridrpc

Interface Summary
GrpcClient This interface stands for a client module.
GrpcExecInfo this interface represents execution log information for an invocation of GridRPC.
 

Class Summary
GrpcClientFactory A Factory class to get a GrpcClient for a specific grid rpc system.
GrpcHandle Represents a handle for a remote function.
 

Exception Summary
GrpcException Exception class to represent Grid RPC related Exceptions
